MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Hart Project in North America dated October 2012

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Hart Project in North America dated October 2012
document.description: This report is a preliminary economic assessment for the Hart Project of Liberty Mines Inc. and includes inferred mineral resources that are considered too speculative geologically to be categorized as mineral reserves.
